881530.name: KingOfEgyptGX
881530.description:
KingOfEgyptGX is an amazing platform game with smooth controls!

You are Henry Page searching for the Sceptre of Thoth to resurrect your wife, died some years ago.

Fulfil your destiny, play and experience the thrills and adventures of this mysterious tale.

- Beautiful graphics
- New worlds to discover
- Captivating music
- Smooth controls
- Levels are filled with traps and with guards who can only be defeated by excellent swordplay or trickery!

Fight against the most famous and powerful Gods of Ancient Egypt in KingOfEgyptGX!
881530.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 日语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
